data.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Formalization of Micro Food processing Enterprises Scheme (PMFME)  - Support for Common Infrastructure  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides credit linked grant @ 35% with max. limit as prescribed.
data.eligibility: All units providing common processing facility for processing of ODOP produce are eligible under this component.
data.conditions:
1. DPR for capital investment and common infrastructure should be prepared. 
  2. Premises for assaying of agriculture produce, sorting, grading, warehouse and cold storage at the farm-gate.
data.beneficiaries: All units providing common processing facility for processing of ODOP produce are eligible under this component.
data.prerequisites:
1. DPR for capital investment and common infrastructure should be prepared. 
  2. Premises for assaying of agriculture produce, sorting, grading, warehouse and cold storage at the farm-gate.
data.nodal_agency: Ministry of Food Processing Industries, Union Bank of India as the Nodal Bank
data.context: This scheme is introduced to Support for transition of existing 2,00,000 enterprises into formal framework.
data.objective: The main aim is to Increased access for the enterprises, to professional and technical support.
data.description:
1. Scheme provides credit linked grant @ 35% with max. limit as prescribed. 
  2. Assistance of Rs. 0.50 lakh per case would be provided to FPOs/SHGs/ Cooperatives for preparation of DPR.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://pmfme.mofpi.gov.in/pmfme/#/Register-New-User
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit after the approval of the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. GST Certificate 
3. Financials for Last 2 years 
4. Projected financial data 
5. Lending Bank Details 
6. Basic KYC Documents
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
Ministry of Food Processing Industries
Panchsheel Bhawan, 
August Kranti Marg,
Khelgaon, New Delhi-110049

Email id: support-pmfme@mofpi.gov.in  
Contact Details: 011-26406500
data.beneficiary: Food Processing Industry  - SHGs, Co-Operative, Others  - All Location  - Micro
